On Forever, Lil Wayne says "I'm resting in the lead, i need a pillow and a cover", on Drop The World, Eminem says "Sleep on me, that pillow is where your head will lie, permanently bitch, it's beddy-bye".
he says ""bitch i'mma let you fiinish in 1 minute" or something like that
You wear your heart on your sleeve I've got that white tank.
it was in drop the world
Luis Alejandro Marquez
LOL it doesn't take much to fool lil wayne hes so stupid lol
The whole verse in No Love is a diss.. Pretty much saying how Wayne is subpar compared to the level he is on

"Look at these rappers, how I treat 'em
So why the fuck would I join them when I beat 'em
They call me a freak cause I like to spit on these pussies 'fore I eat 'em
Man get these whack cocksuckers off stage
Where the fuck is Kanye when you need him
Snatch the mic from 'em, bitch I'mma let you finish in a minute
Yeah that rap was tight
But I'm 'bout spit the greatest verse of all time
So you might want to go back to the lab tonight and um
Scribble out them rhymes you were going to spit
And start over from scratch and write new ones"

Em's whole verse is a diss on Lil Wayne

only eminem dickriders will believe that. it's about whoever you want it to be about. those youtube videos hold no water. just because he was on forever with wayne, automatically means that he is dissing wayne on the next song theyre on together because they both said pillow? i think everyone's had enough internet for today.
and btw i've been a big eminem fan since the start
and i hate lil wayne with every piece of my being. so this is not me being a "hater"

the illuminatti isn't behind everything

Why would Em diss Wayne when he said he enjoyed working with him? You can't just believe everything you read on the internet, those lines could have been aimed at any rapper. I'm sure you could read, somewhere on the internet, how Em has been dissing Dre on half his songs, or crap like that.
he diss Wayne in subliminal messages you got to re listen to what he says and what he says mean completely something else to what you think it is No love and forever was a massive diss to Lil Wayne
Shane Henderson

@mike he has a point but you never know if he actually tried to diss them
In seduction eminem disses jay z and lil wayne, listen to the song stans! it's an awesome song
Lol... Even not afraid was pointed 2 him
I think he's dissing every subpar rapper in Seduction, tbh. I don't think it's aimed at Jay-Z and Lil Wayne.
That's not cheesy :l
That verse doesn't diss Lil Wayne, he's talking about any rapper that he battles with.
He dissed Kayne in that song not Lil Wayne
